These 6.5-7mm freshwater pearls are AAA quality, with a good luster and have very few tiny noticeable defects. This necklace has a length of approximately 40cm.We have white pearls available for immediate delivery. This modern freshwater pearl necklace is idea for any age or occasion, and is especially appropriate for your special lady.

Today, the pearl ring is a universal symbol of innocence and purity. It is considered the traditional gift to celebrate wedding anniversaries and some other big events. Comfortable and stylish, this 8mm genuine pearl ring is the best value for your money! Only white colored pearls are available for immediate delivery. This beautiful ring will arrive at your or your special someone’s door attractively packaged (for free)!

Korean Style 925 Silver Silvery AAA Freshwater Pearl 9-10MM

http://www.beautiful-pearl.com/Korean-Style-925-Silver-Silve




Retail Price : US$334.48
Price : US$88.02
Water Quality/Category:Freshwater Pearl
Origin:Tai Lake Bead
Shape:Round A2
Glossiness Levelretty Strong/Excellent A
Surface Perfectionerfect A
Size:9-10 mm Pearl (Big)
Material of Other Accessories:925 Silver
Suitable Consumer Group:Ladies
Suitable Occasions:Gift
Freshwater pearls are adorned for their vivid colors, usual shapes and large size. What makes them even more popular is the incredible low price! The pearl has natural silvery body color and brilliant, rich overtones, with a smooth, clean surface. It has an exquisite luster and bright reminiscent of the finest satin. The pearl on the pendant is genuine freshwater cultured pearl, not imitation or plastic! At any other retail outlet, you would probably even pay double price for a pearl at this size and this quality.

We’ll match a beautiful chain for this pedant (for free!) As with all our products, they will arrive at your or your special someone’s door attractively packaged (for free)!
